tool.name: mobile_dynamic_status
tool.description: Check whether Android dynamic instrumentation dependencies are available and enumerate connected devices.

parameter.name: platform
parameter.description: Target platform ("android" or "ios"). Android performs ADB device enumeration when available.

returns.description: Availability map for adb/frida/objection, optional device list, raw adb output, and platform notes.

tool.name: mobile_adb
tool.description: Execute an adb subcommand for operator-assisted Android dynamic workflows.

parameter.name: command
parameter.description: ADB subcommand without the adb prefix, e.g. "devices", "shell pm list packages", "forward tcp:27042 tcp:27042".

returns.description: Command execution result with success, exit_code, stdout, stderr, and command echo.

tool.name: mobile_frida_ps
tool.description: List processes/apps visible to frida on Android devices for dynamic instrumentation setup.

returns.description: Command execution result with success, exit_code, stdout, stderr, and command echo.
